content.description: This climb is located on a small spire-like formation at the South end of The Iguana Dome.  There are two climbs side by side, and this is the right of the two.  The climbs face north. This goes up thin cracks.
content.location: On a separate small spire-like formation at the south end of the Iguana Dome Formation. Two climbs on the N. Face; this is the right of the two.

content.description: Plastic Lizard is a lieback crack in a right facing corner.  Start off a large boulder that leans against the face.  Lieback the corner as it steapens to bulge.  Pull the bulge to the top.
content.protection: Singles with hand to large hand for anchor.
content.location: This route is located on the North face of The Iguana, just up and right of Fabio's Crack.

content.description: This route lies 50 feet right of Appendectomy Crack.  It is a finger crack in a right-facing corner leading to a chimney slot.
content.location: Right side of the W.face of the Iguana

content.description: Crack to a roof.  This is on a small spire/formation right of The Mine Shaft, and on the south end of The Iguana formation.  The route faces north, and is one of two climbs on this cool little formation.  This is the left of the two routes.
content.location: So. end of Iguana Dome, on a separate spire-like formation.  Climbs face North.

content.description: This is the left of two similar cracks. The right crack is The Appendectomy Crack 5.10d*** in Randy's guide.
content.protection: This is a difficult crack climb, so bring a trad rack.
content.location: This is the left of two cracks.

content.description: Located up in the boulders up and left of Plastic Lizard on the N. Face of the Iguana.  Faces north as well.  Starts sort of down in a hole, and climbs up and out. Cool, difficult, and short.
content.location: N. Face of the Iguana Dome, halfway up the north face boulders. Faces north.

climbs.name: Jamie Tolerates Derek
climbs.fa: Derek Renich, Todd Gordon, Dana Adler, Jamie

content.description: This is a crack climb on the SW face of The Iguana.  It is located between The Black Tounge and The Man and The Woman formation.
content.protection: A few pieces sm to large

climbs.name: Happy Birthday, Rrrrrrrrrrrrrrren
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Norm Miller, Nicholas Miller, Cyndie Bransford

content.description: This is a low angle slab route that goes up brown rock in the middle of the east face of the Iguana.  It is the only bolted route on this face.
content.protection: QDs for the four bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: Slabby section of the east face of The Iguana

content.description: Climb an obvious right-arching 1-2" crack on the north face of the Iguana.
Flake to a crack between Appendectomy and Mine Shaft, and starts just left of a chimney.
Boulder into a slot between 2 boulders against the west face of Iguana Dome.  Cruise to the top of the right block, where a short, steep thin hand crack leads to the top.
